main event: A bright, glowing white object was observed moving rapidly across the sky near Odessa, Texas on September 12, 1965.
interesting points: The object appeared very high in the sky at first, then seemed to drop and move towards the horizon, becoming smaller as it went.
The object took on the appearance of an airplane traveling through the sky, but seemed to be moving more rapidly than a typical airplane.
The object suddenly disappeared from view after being observed for several minutes.
There was no cloud cover in the sky, and the object was brightly illuminated.
The observer compared the brightness of the object to the brightest planet or the largest meteor they had ever seen.
photographs: no photographs were present in the report
